content: Cosmo Radiance is one of the unique materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for weapon and armor crafting to craft unique gear unlocked upon defeating a boss.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Cosmo_Radiance.md', within the main section titled 'Cosmo Radiance'.
The content is as follows:
Cosmo Radiance is one of the unique materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for weapon and armor crafting to craft unique gear unlocked upon defeating a boss.
